other_tests.findings: Left axis deviation, paroxysmal supraventricular tachycardia with heart rate of 150/min and ST-T segment changes.
Enlarged left heart, thickening of the posterior wall of the left ventricle, minor amounts of mitral regurgitation, ventricular wall hypokinesis and decreased left heart function.
Slight endocardial thickening of the left ventricle, minor thickening of the myocardium, and diffuse motion reduction of the ventricular wall with no apparent delayed enhancement abnormalities.

Hepatic cyst (size: 0.93 cm × 0.75 cm), bilateral renal multiple cysts (largest size: 1.1 cm × 1.7 cm), and a markedly enlarged liver with a right oblique diameter of 8.25 cm and an inferior hepatic border 6.32 cm from the right inferior costal arch border of the midclavicular line.
